p: An increasing number of researchers are keen to explore new, simple, and safe auxiliary or alternative solutions to treat insomnia. Aromatherapy is an alternative therapy to assist in medical treatment by using the pure essential oils of an aromatic plant. People extract essential oils with different smells and colors from naturally aromatic plants. These essential oils mainly contain terpenes, aldehydes, esters, alcohols, and other chemical components. Essential oils can be directly inhaled, bathed in, or used in massages, and these essential oils have been used to reduce insomnia, anxiety, pain, fatigue, and other symptoms [ 7â€“ 10].
